ygData.subject: Re: OOPS  Accidental...YAY works now
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep it works now, must have been the rich text...or maybe the red font. Cool, thanks Bob. :)
ygData.messageBody:
Yep it works now, must have been the rich text...or maybe the red font.
Cool, thanks Bob. :)



At 01:56 AM 6/28/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: Bob <vampyre@...>
>
>I am using outlook express. A fairly standard mail reader I assume. It was
>set in rich text(html) settings i was using chancelor font in red to go
>with my 'Vampyre' nick name. Now I am in plain text mode. Very bnoring but
>maybe easir for everyone to read. Let's see if this works.
